/**
 * The PatientHealthRecord class represents a patient's health record in a healthcare system.
 * It contains information such as the patient's unique identifier, healthcare provider's unique identifier,
 * and the patient's last name.
 * 
 * This class provides methods to get and set the patient's ID, healthcare provider's ID, and last name.
 * 
 * The main functionalities of this class include:
 * - Storing and retrieving the patient's unique identifier
 * - Storing and retrieving the healthcare provider's unique identifier
 * - Storing and retrieving the patient's last name
 * 
 * Overall, the PatientHealthRecord class encapsulates the essential information related to a patient's health record
 * and provides methods to interact with this information.
 */
public class PatientHealthRecord {
    private long hcpID;
    private long patientID;
    private String lastName;

    /**
     * Returns the HCP ID associated with this object.
     * 
     * @return the HCP ID as a long value
     */
    public long getHcpID() {
        return hcpID;
    }

    /**
     * Sets the HCP ID for this object.
     * 
     * @param hcpID the new HCP ID to set
     * @return void
     * 
     * This method sets the HCP ID for this object to the specified value. 
     * The HCP ID is a unique identifier for a healthcare provider.
     */
    public void setHcpID(long hcpID) {
        this.hcpID = hcpID;
    }

    /**
     * Retrieves the unique identifier for the patient.
     * 
     * @return the patient's ID as a long value
     */
    public long getPatientID() {
        return patientID;
    }

    /**
     * Sets the patient ID for this object.
     * 
     * @param patientID the unique identifier for the patient
     * 
     * This method sets the patient ID for this object to the specified value.
     * 
     * @return void
     */
    public void setPatientID(long patientID) {
        this.patientID = patientID;
    }

    /**
     * Retrieves the last name of the person.
     * 
     * @return the last name of the person as a String
     */
    public String getLastName() {
        return lastName;
    }

    /**
     * Sets the last name for this object.
     * 
     * @param lastName the last name of the person
     */
    public void setLastName(String lastName) {
        this.lastName = lastName;
    }
}
